channel.title: CVE Feed for awordpresslife -- Coming Soon Maintenance Mode
channel.description: The latest CVEs for awordpresslife -- Coming Soon Maintenance Mode

item.title: CVE-2024-1475|2024-02-20T18:56:29.088Z -- awordpresslife -- Coming Soon Maintenance Mode
item.description: The Coming Soon Maintenance Mode plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Sensitive Information Exposure in all versions up to, and including, 1.0.5 via the REST API. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to obtain post and page content thus bypassing the protection provided by the plugin.
